directions.step:
Place a 1-pound wedge of Brie on an ovenproof serving platter with a 1-inch-deep rim.. Bake in a preheated 350 degree F oven until softened and slightly runny (20 minutes).
Serve with crackers.
Recipe By : The California Culinary Academy
File ftp://ftp.idiscover.co.uk/pub/food/mealmaster/recipes/mmdja006.zip
